summary.span: 命名空间提供类，用于缓存服务器上经常使用的数据。

span.span: The namespace provides classes for caching frequently used data on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间包括类，使你能够存储数据对象，如哈希表和数据集的字典。This namespace includes the class, a dictionary that enables you to store data objects such as hash tables and data sets. 它还提供对这些对象和方法，使你可以添加和删除的对象的过期功能。It also provides expiration functionality for those objects, and methods that enable you to add and remove the objects. 你可以将对象添加到缓存的依赖于其他文件或缓存条目。You can add the objects to the cache with a dependency on other files or cache entries. 在这种情况下，对象可以调用一个回调方法来从缓存中移除对象时通知你的应用程序。In that case, the object can invoke a callback method to notify your application when an object is removed from the cache.
